title: Increased oil prices impact real GDP, price level

content.question: Based on the diagram above, what effect will an increase in the world supply of oil have on real gross domestic product and the price level?

choices.label: Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level Decrease Increase
Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level Decrease Decrease
Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level Increase Increase
Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level Increase No change
Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level Increase Decrease

content.answer: Real Gross Domestic Product Price Level Increase Decrease

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
